actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption of No. 2 heating oil and No. 2-D diesel fuel from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations (energy action No. 3).

summary.text: Disapproves the Federal Energy Administration's proposed energy action numbered 3 which would exempt number 2 heating oil and number 2-D diesel fuel from mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations.

titles.title: Resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption of No. 2 heating oil and No. 2-D diesel fuel from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations (energy action No. 3).
